title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Sprockett D (2025). codiv: Performs Host-Microbe Codiversification Scans. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://danielsprockett.github.io/codiv/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {codiv: Performs Host-Microbe Codiversification Scans},   author = {Daniel Sprockett},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://danielsprockett.github.io/codiv/}, }

title: Performs Host-Microbe Codiversification Scans
text: Performs Host-Microbe Codiversification Scans codiv R package performs codiversification scans pairs host symbiont phylogenetic trees. main functions accepts host tree, symbiont tree, data.frame links symbionts isolated hosts. outputs correlation coefficient node symbiont tree denoted well ’s topology correlated host tree. Nodes high degree correlation consistent codiversification hosts symbionts. helper functions also included.

title: Performs Host-Microbe Codiversification Scans
text: can install development version codiv GitHub : Citation: Daniel D. Sprockett, Brian . Dillard, Abigail . Landers, Jon G. Sanders, Andrew H. Moeller. (2025) Recent genetic drift co-diversified gut bacterial symbionts laboratory mice. Nature Communications Accepted.

title: Checks inputs to codiv() — check_inputs
Checks inputs to codiv() — check_inputs
code: check_inputs(   Host_tree,   Symbiont_tree,   Host_to_Symbiont_df,   min_hosts,   min_symbiont_tips,   span_fraction,   permutations )

title: Checks inputs to codiv() — check_inputs
text: Host_tree binary phylogenetic tree hosts Symbiont_tree binary phylogenetic tree symbionts Host_to_Symbiont_df data.frame() pairs tips Symbiont_tree tip Host_tree isolated . min_hosts minimum number hosts node evaluated (must greater 3) min_symbiont_tips minimum number symbiont tips node evaluated (recommend 7 ) span_fraction fraction Symbiont_tree included codiv scan permutations number permutations (recommend least 99)

title: Checks inputs to codiv() — check_inputs
Checks inputs to codiv() — check_inputs
code: Host_tree <- ape::rtree(10) Symbiont_tree <- ape::rtree(100) Host_to_Symbiont_df <- data.frame("Host" = rep(Host_tree$tip.label, 10),                                      "Symbiont" = Symbiont_tree$tip.label) check_inputs(Host_tree, Symbiont_tree, Host_to_Symbiont_df, 3, 7, 0.25, 99) #> `Host_tree` and `Symbiont_tree` Inputs must be binary phylogentic trees #> `Symbiont_tree` contains tips that are not in`Host_to_Symbiont_df`

what: Co-Diversification Scan Between Hosts and Symbionts — codiv
title: Co-Diversification Scan Between Hosts and Symbionts — codiv
Co-Diversification Scan Between Hosts and Symbionts — codiv
code: codiv(   Host_tree,   Symbiont_tree,   Host_to_Symbiont_df,   min_hosts = 3,   min_symbiont_tips = 7,   span_fraction = 0.1,   permutations = 99,   seed = 8675309,   verbose = TRUE,   Save_fp,   methods = c("hommola", "paco", "parafit"),   focus_hosts,   subtree_features = TRUE,   cores = 4,   continue = TRUE )
